languages.text: Оторванная клешня, увенчанная древним и могучим болтером, стала трофеем Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: Оторванная клешня, увенчанная древним и могучим болтером, стала трофеем Вольного Торговца.

languages.text: The abomination's torn pincer, fitted with an ancient and powerful bolter, became the Rogue Trader's rightful trophy.
languages.original_text: Оторванная клешня, увенчанная древним и могучим болтером, стала трофеем Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: The abomination's torn pincer fitted with an ancient and powerful bolter became the Rogue Trader's rightful trophy.
The abomination's torn pincer fitted with an ancient and powerful bolter became the Rogue Trader's rightful trophy.

The abomination's torn pincer, fitted with an ancient and powerful bolter, became the Rogue Trader's rightful trophy.
The abomination's torn pincer, fitted with an ancient and powerful bolter, became the Rogue Trader's rightful trophy.

languages.text: 那只怪物的利爪被砍了下来，利爪上安装着一把古老而强大的爆矢枪。于是，这件武器便成为了行商浪人的战利品。
languages.original_text: The abomination's torn pincer, fitted with an ancient and powerful bolter, became the Rogue Trader's rightful trophy.

traits.locale_text: 那只怪物的利爪被砍了下来，利爪上安装着一把古老而强大的爆矢枪。于是，这件武器便成为了行商浪人的战利品。

languages.text: Fixée sur un ancien et puissant bolter, la pince arrachée au monstre s'est transformée en trophée bien mérité pour {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: The abomination's torn pincer, fitted with an ancient and powerful bolter, became the Rogue Trader's rightful trophy.

traits.locale_text: Fixée sur un ancien et puissant bolter, la pince arrachée au monstre s'est transformée en trophée bien mérité pour {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}.

languages.text: 古代の強力なボルターを装着した忌まわしき鋏は、自由開拓者の正当な戦利品となった。
languages.original_text: The abomination's torn pincer, fitted with an ancient and powerful bolter, became the Rogue Trader's rightful trophy.

traits.locale_text: 古代の強力なボルターを装着した忌まわしき鋏は、自由開拓者の正当な戦利品となった。

languages.text: La tenaza equipada con un antiguo y poderoso bólter de la abominación fue arrancada y se convirtió en trofeo para {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: The abomination's torn pincer, fitted with an ancient and powerful bolter, became the Rogue Trader's rightful trophy.

traits.locale_text: La tenaza equipada con un antiguo y poderoso bólter de la abominación fue arrancada y se convirtió en trofeo para {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: Die abgerissene Schere des Monstrums wurde mit einem uralten, mächtigen Bolter ausgestattet und wurde zur rechtmäßigen Trophäe {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}.
languages.original_text: The abomination's torn pincer, fitted with an ancient and powerful bolter, became the Rogue Trader's rightful trophy.

traits.locale_text: Die abgerissene Schere des Monstrums wurde mit einem uralten, mächtigen Bolter ausgestattet und wurde zur rechtmäßigen Trophäe {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}.

languages.text: Garabetin kadim ve kudretli bir bulonatarla donatılmış kopuk kıskacı, Hür Tacir'in hakkıyla kazandığı bir ganimete dönüştü.
languages.original_text: The abomination's torn pincer, fitted with an ancient and powerful bolter, became the Rogue Trader's rightful trophy.
